title: Hhampuz
author: Hhampuz
created_time: March 28, 2023, 02:00:32 AMLast edit: August 15, 2023, 10:06:24 PM by Hhampuz
content: whirlwind.money is redefining privacy when it comes to mixing your coins through "Blinded Bearer Certificates". Taking the best of what's out there and building on top of it with added privacy as well as simplicity we want to run this signature campaign to spread the word. If you are a quality poster we want to hire YOU!Rules and Requirements:Wear the Signature.There is no minimum requirement of posts that you need to make each week that you participate but I ask that you at least try and be active.A maximum of 25 posts per week will be eligible for a payout.Do not have legitimate negative feedback on your profile from a DT-member.If you receive any legitimate negative feedback from a DT-member during your stay you may be removed without payment or notice.Posts in Off-Topic, Games and Rounds, this thread and any other campaign/bounty threads as well as threads where your signature isn't displayed will not be eligible for a payout.Posts need to be on topic and somewhat constructive in order to be eligible for a payout.You can't wear any other Signature during your stay in this campaign. You can wear a different Avatar but not from a competing service.Do not enroll your main + alt account in this campaign, if you do, both will be removed and you'll be blacklisted from this and any other of my campaigns.Each payment will be sent directly to your whirlwind note public address each Wednesday.Each week will run from Wednesdays to Tuesdays, cut-off is on Tuesdays at 23:59:59 according to my timezone (CET).This campaign is open for Sr. Members, Hero Members and Legendary Members.whirlwind.money reserves the right to cancel and/or make changes to the campaign at their discretion. Each started week will be paid out in full!Payouts and Positions:26x Sr./Hero/Legendary Members - $6/post.The Signatures:Sr
